meanings.definition: A day of the week, typically Monday.
meanings.sent1: On lunes, we start the week with energy.
meanings.sent2: I have a meeting every lunes.
meanings.sent3: Forgetting it was lunes, he wore his pajamas to work.
meanings.sent4: The sun rose brightly on lunes, signaling the start of a new week.
meanings.sent5: Children love lunes because it means school starts again.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Peru.
meanings.sent1: She exchanged her dollars for Peruvian lunes.
meanings.sent2: The price was quoted in lunes.
meanings.sent3: He found a forgotten stash of lunes in his old backpack.
meanings.sent4: In Peru, lunes is used for everyday transactions.
meanings.sent5: Tourists often collect lunes as souvenirs of their trip.

meanings.definition: A type of fabric made from wool.
meanings.sent1: The soft lunes fabric kept her warm in winter.
meanings.sent2: The sweater was knitted from lunes.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally spilled coffee on his new lunes coat.
meanings.sent4: The lunes material was perfect for the cozy blanket.
meanings.sent5: The fashion designer chose lunes for its luxurious feel.
